subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: The Chicago Fire is the hottest team in Major League Soccer, Coach Juan Carlos Osorio is the maestro of the month, and Cuauhtémoc Blanco is the spider spinning an unavoidable web.
snippet: The Chicago Fire is the hottest team in Major League Soccer, Coach Juan Carlos Osorio is the maestro of the month, and Cuauhtémoc Blanco is the spider spinning an unavoidable web.
